item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, June 24, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Conservatives have lost a third of their voters since January, poll finds
2. [Opinion] New York or London — what’s your table talk style?
3. [Opinion] The absence of honesty in UK election will undermine democracy itself
4. How the Conservatives lost touch with England’s prosperous south
5. Cut-price anti-drone weapon could be ready next year
